Uses of Class
QuadTreePath

    • Uses of QuadTreePath in <Unnamed>

      Fields in <Unnamed> declared as QuadTreePath 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      QuadTreePath QuadBranch.path
      The QuadTreePath to this QuadBranch.
      protected QuadTreePath Entity.path
      An index used by the QuadTree in the Spacetime grid to quickly locate the quadrant in which this Entity is currently located.
      QuadTreePath QuadTree.path
      The path to this QuadTree is represented with {-2}.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return QuadTreePath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      QuadTreePath QuadTreePath.getBranchPath(int quadrant)
      Returns a new QuadTreePath instance identical to this one, but with the specified quadrant ID node concatenated to the end.
      QuadTreePath QuadTreePath.getParentPath()
      Returns a new QuadTreePath instance identical to this one, except one node shorter.
      QuadTreePath QuadBranch.searchDownwards(Entity e)
      Attempts to find the specified Entity in the QuadBranch structure from here downwards, including this QuadBranch itself.
      QuadTreePath QuadTree.searchDownwards(Entity e)
      Attempts to find the specified Entity in this QuadTree structure.
      QuadTreePath QuadBranch.searchUpwards(Entity e)
      Attempts to find the specified Entity in an upwards pattern.
      QuadTreePath QuadTree.searchUpwards(Entity e)
      Attempts to find the specified Entity in this QuadTree structure.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type QuadTreePath 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected QuadBranch QuadTree.getBranch(QuadTreePath path)
      Retrieves the QuadBranch specified by the given QuadTreePath.
